title: T227 Complete Set of 4 Baseball Players Including Cobb - SGC 30 - SOLD

posts.post_title: T227 Complete Set of 4 Baseball Players Including Cobb - SGC 30 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Complete set of all four T227 Baseball Players in similar good condition

Baker - SGC 20
Bender - SGC 30
Cobb - SGC 30
Marquard - SGC 30

Cards have been sold - Thanks for your interest

Please email [url]phlflyer1@gmail.com[/url] if interested
